Welcome

I’m a designer from Vancouver, Canada. I currently work at Jostle. Please enjoy these selected projects:

  • Know Ideas

    Book Design, Print Production, Writing

    Award winning exploration of the Internet using printed experiments.

  • Map of the Internet

    UX/UI, iOS, Android

    Map of the Internet is a 3D visualization of the internet.

  • Devmonitor.io

    UX/UI, Branding, Web

    A web app for ‘devangelists’ to track questions from Stackoverflow.

  • ECUAD Catalog Platform

    UI/UX, Front-endDev, iPad

    A scalable system to help curators approve and share hundreds projects annually.

  • Bravado Magazine

    UI/UX, Front-end Dev, Web

    We reshaped content and Bravado Mag became “high gloss pixels”.

  • Making Conversation

    Podcast, Indentity, Community

    A podcast featuring conversations with artists and designers.
